name: GitHub
title: github.com
shortDescription: GitHub is a platform for developers to build, ship, and maintain their software. It offers tools for collaboration, code review, and automated workflows, making it ideal for both small teams and large enterprises. Example use case: A software development team uses GitHub to manage their codebase, track issues, and automate their deployment pipeline.
cons: Can be expensive for private repos

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Bitbucket
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Tight integration with Jira and Trello

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: SourceForge
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Focus on open source project hosting
